original_title: Struggle No More: The Windy City Strugglers Story
overview: Their music has been described as deep blues from way down under, as if the Mississippi River had gorged its way through the center of the earth and come home in...New Zealand of all places. They are the Windy City Strugglers. This film offers a funny and passionate look at 40 years of obscurity and great music.
tagline: Music is too important to take seriously
title: Struggle No More: The Windy City Strugglers Story
